Class AdjustableClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.testing.AdjustableClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clock

    public class AdjustableClock
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clock
    An adjustable clock to allow better testing.
    Since:
    3.0

      • adjustTime

        public void adjustTime(long adjustment)
        Adjust the current time. If the adjustment is positive, the clock advances. If the adjustment is negative, you go back in time.
        Parameters:
        adjustment - the adjustment, in milliseconds.

      • getTimeMillis

        public long getTimeMillis()
        Return the current time, in milliseconds.
